comments_since_last_sample.body: Labor makes the product expensive but sad to say farmers dont get the right wages for the labor. Sucks the other company.
We had harvest of 260 kilo of dry black cardamom, which we usually sold for 2000 rupee per kilo but Indian govt banned the export of black cardamom making the price lower than 300 rupees
